data.title: Added Rectangle functionality
data.body:
Added the ability to calculate the aspect ratio and center position, as
well as centering to a point, and fitting inside/outside another
rectangle

data.title: Update TextField.java can't copy passwords ANYMORE
data.body:
Was able to copy passwords ;)
Now, can't copy passwords anymore...

data.title: Fixing the fetch and gitignore
data.body:
Just a nuisance I ran into with setting up the source. If this gets merged everyone that has the current source will have to delete the accidental x96 directory located in extensions/gdx-remote/libs/ after fetching.

I wasn't planning on having the rectangle on this PR but I accidentally pushed it to master. Sorry about that.

data.title: Update TextField.java offsetLeftX/offsetRightX
data.body:
Ok, so I found a problem with this in LibGDX, since text is drawn over my TextFieldStyle image... (It has a black border.) I only played with a the values offsetLeftX/offsetRightX, and I don't know how I can test this, so it isn't tested yet...

Thanks in advance!

data.title: setAngle in Vector2 now returns this for chaining.
data.body:
setAngle returns "this" as with all over Vector2 functions that do not return another value.

First ever Pull Request, don't break my heart.

data.title: Fixed a few resource leaks that were causing warnings, and changed the way Vector constants are handled.
data.body: I was frustrated to discover that if you forget to call cpy() when accessing Vector2.Zero or any of the other Vector "constants" you can easily modify them by accident. I figured it would be better to have static methods that return new Vectors instead of public static final Vectors that can be easily modified by calling set() or any other operation on them.

data.title: Changed robovm.xml files for RoboVM sample games to turn off pngcrush
data.body: In RoboVM 0.0.4 (not yet released) PNG files will by default be run through pngcrush. AFAIU libgdx doesn't support the Apple specific optimizations done by Xcode's pngcrush so this can be turned off by adding <skipPngCrush>true</skipPngCrush> to each <resource> in the app's robovm.xml. This patch fixes this for all of the demo games.

data.title: Updated maven-download-plugin version to 1.1.0
data.body:
Update is necessary to build libgdx with maven behind a proxy. 
Using proxy in wget goal was added in maven-download-plugin two month ago in version 1.1.0.
Proof: https://github.com/maven-download-plugin/maven-download-plugin/pull/13

data.title: Added relative or absolute argument to FileHandleResolver.resolve()
Fixed getFrameRate()
data.body: I believe this should return frameRate, not 0.

data.title: Issue 1559 and typo fix
data.body:
Had the same JSON deserialization problem as in issue 1559; now that it's fixed, I had a look at the code and noticed that test code was left in.

Also, small typo fix.

data.title: Added pause and resume methods for Sound
data.body: These methods allow pausing and resuming individual sounds as well as the entire soundpool. Implemented for all backends.

data.title: Kotlin compatibility fix
data.body: Fix add ability to deveop games with kotlin (see. http://kotlin.jetbrains.org/). Issue http://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/KT-3091 didn't fix

data.title: Update NetJavaImpl.java
data.body: issue 1576

data.title: Fixes Issue #1581; caused by assumption that type is null.
data.body: Fixes Issue #1581

data.title: DefaultTextureBinder: Reset texture descriptor at begin
Stage remove initialize
data.body:
Note that I'm not very experienced with scene 2d, so I might be missing something. But I noticed that:
- Stage#batch is private final and has a getter, so it might as well be public final.
- Stage#ownsBatch is private final, it doesn't hurt to make it public final.
- Some private arrays in Stage are set on construction and never set again, so they might as well be final.
- ownsBatch depends on whether a SpriteBatch is given, so adding a batch==null check allows for one general constructor.
- Stage#initialize is private and only called on construction, so it might as well be in the constructor.
- Stage#root is private, only set on construction and has a getter, so it might as well be public final.

data.title: allow Android `internal` to fall back to classpath (just like on Desktop!)
data.body:
libGDX loads `internal` from the working directory, then the classpath on Desktop (or did the last time I checked)

libGDX uses "just" assets on Android

This patch (should) mean that libGDX behaves the same way in these two places - falling back to classpath in both places

data.title: getScale on Matrix4
data.body: Missing getScale method

data.title: Active/Passive scrollbars for scene2d ScrollPane
data.body:
With active scrollbars (default), scrollbars can be manipulated to
scroll the pane as currently, while passive scrollbars act as mere scroll position
indicators and cannot be directly manipulated.

Added methods setActiveScrollbars(boolean) and isActiveScrollbars()

Passive scrollbars can be used when only flick scrolling is desired, and when combined with setScrollbarsOnTop(true) and a conviniently padded nine patch can be used to make the scrollbars appear on the top or left sides of the ScrollPane

data.title: Add some methods for Thread GWT emulation.
Fixed typo of canvasId in the gwt configuration.
data.body: I couldn't find anywhere this was actually used, dismiss this if I'm incorrect.

data.title: Mesh cache attribute locations
data.body:
- VertexAttribute: add getKey method which returns an unique number which can be used to identify the attribute (its bsf(usage)<<8|unit, although its not intended to have a useful meaning other than identifying).
- VertexData: allow to specify an IntIntMap for cached attribute (based on getKey) locations for bind/unbind.
- VA/VBO: Implement those methods, also some small optimizations.
- Mesh: Add the IntIntMap to bind/unbind, also allow to override autoBind in the render method to make it easier for a Shader to cache meshes.

data.title: Bullet & 3D: small changes
data.body:
Add normal support for soft bodies
Fix nested iterator for model/modelinstance
Add some helper methods to node

data.title: updates the pom.xml
data.body:
updates the pom.xml of gdx-core and gdx-jnigen.
I need the gdx-jnigen working in order to include the gdx-freetype module in maven properly

data.title: Implemented missing sound functionality in GWT backend
data.body: I've implemented most of the missing functionality in GWTSound and GWTMusic. The only thing still missing is setPitch, which doesn't seem to be possible using soundmanager2.

data.title: Added a convenience method
data.body: I added a method that takes two Vector3 objects, unpacks them, then calls the "real" line method
